title: A History of Diabetes, Pre Insulin, Part 1
itunes:title: A History of Diabetes, Pre Insulin, Part 1
description:
To lead into discussing the discovery of insulin, today we have a history of diabetes and its treatment in the centuries before insulin was developed, including the starvation diets that were used in the years just before the discovery. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
